dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3844437S] AUP Violation at 209.62.2.210
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, April 16, 2007 7:46 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3844437S] AUP Violation at 209.62.2.210 ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. AUP Violation at 209.62.2.210 Added by system at Tuesday, Apr 17 2007 12:02 am X-MailFrom: kirkcrawford@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:sender:to:subject:mime-version:content-t ype:x-google-sender-auth; b=Xh6zhRk7WBaDQBS1UXvXFEqPYI5tXZhJ1a17CzPuFCxiILHdljX+CRH6n7QGjSPm461qDl 2dFkSWLTB88OqyHy8U1AMTfeGiyJBQffEtRDXZ0rGT6tg7No7MUvVlldTVBKLcNTIPW3Fu5N kzEcHwJIH/wOnpZ4Qk+KI4fqG1gXw= Received: by 10.70.130.8 with SMTP id c8mr2517907wxd.1176786133161; Mon, 16 Apr 2007 22:02:13 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.35.93.17 with HTTP; Mon, 16 Apr 2007 22:02:13 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <671315680704162202u7ca4d2eevf7f5819aff476704@mail.gmail.com> Date: Mon, 16 Apr 2007 22:02:13 -0700 From: "Kirk Crawford" Sender: kirkcrawford@gmail.com To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: AUP Violation at 209.62.2.210 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_22657_1066180.1176786133069" X-Google-Sender-Auth: d12e22126b5d34bd Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 66.249.82.235 as permitted sender) client-ip=66.249.82.235; envelope-from=kirkcrawford@gmail.com; helo=wx-out-0506.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 17 Apr 2007 05:02:30.0716 (UTC) FILETIME=[9A24F7C0:01C780AD] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sirs, I would like to complain about one of your user's websites. It is located at htt://209.62.2.210/sportcunt/ The page contains pictures that were stolen from my own website, and taken without permission, thus violating copyright act. The originals are here: http://www.kirkanddonna.com/rtw/pics/0311DMZVinhMocCave.jpg and http://farm1.static.flickr.com/131/370213389_15ca4c6b7a.jpg which is on my flickr page. Besides the fact that the whole page denegrates my wife, the user of your services is violating your Acceptable Use Policy. Please deal with this situation. Best Regards, -- Kirk Crawford kirk@kirkanddonna.com MIME element (text/html) Dear Sirs,
I would like to complain about one of your user's websites.  It is located at htt://209.62.2.210/sportcunt/ The page contains pictures that were stolen from my own website, and taken without permission, thus violating copyright act.  The originals are here:
http: //www.kirkanddonna.com/rtw/pics/0311DMZVinhMocCave.jpg
and
http: //farm1.static.flickr.com/131/370213389_15ca4c6b7a.jpg
which is on my flickr page.

Besides the fact that the whole page denegrates my wife, the user of your services is violating your Acceptable Use Policy.  Please deal with this situation.

Best Regards,


--
Kirk Crawford
